fields.name: Who_will_be_responsible_for_legal_expenses
fields.fieldText: Who will be responsible for legal expenses?

fields.name: Is_this_RFP_for_an_Institutional_matter_or_Transaction
fields.fieldText: Is this request for an Institutional matter or Operations?

fields.name: Description_Deal_type
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿Institutional matter: A matter that is internal to IDB/IDB Invest (e.g. labor dispute) or where the legal services sought are for the benefit of IDB/IDB Invest in one or multiple transactions (e.g. legal opinions). All matters originated by the Compliance or Institutional and Corporate units are considered Institutional for these purposes


ï»¿Operations: A financing operation in which IDB/IDB Invest is the lender / issuer/guarantor/investor. For purposes of this document, operations listed in Maestro should be considered as âTransactionsâ by default

fields.name: LawFirmRecordReminder
fields.fieldText: At least one firm must be added to this RFP Initiation Record before it can be send to the Paralegal.

fields.name: Carefully_Review
fields.fieldText: Carefully review the Law Firms selected for this request. Confirm Law Firm or press Previous to edit if changes are required or you need to add another Law Firm.

fields.name: ReviewRFPData
fields.fieldText:
Carefully read the information you have provided. Press Next to Create this Record and start selecting Law Firms. Press Previous to go Back.

Type: {!Is_this_RFP_for_an_Institutional_matter_or_Transaction}

Transaction: {!Get_Transaction_Number.Transaction_Number_Ext_Id__c}

Transaction Number: {!Transaction_Number_Manual_Input}

Legal Expenses Paid By: {!vLegalExpenses}

Legal Expenses Other: {!vLegalExpenseResponsibilityOther}

Matter Name: {!Matter_Name}

Governing Law: {!Governing_Law_Operations}

Transaction ID: {!varTransactionId}

Description: {!Matter_Description}
